verses.verse: And in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H559>say,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee: <S%H3588>though<s%> thou wast <S%H599>angry<s%> with me, thine <S%H639>anger<s%> is turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> and thou <S%H5162>comfortedst<s%> me.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is my <S%H3444>salvation;<s%> I will <S%H982>trust,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H6342>afraid:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H2176>song;<s%> he also is <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Therefore with <S%H8342>joy<s%> shall ye <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H4480>wells<s%> <S%H4599><s%> of <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

And in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall ye <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3034>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3045>declare<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%> among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> make <S%H2142>mention<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted.<s%>

Sing <S%H2167><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> excellent <S%H1348>things:<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Cry <S%H6670>out<s%> and <S%H7442>shout,<s%> thou <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> is the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee.
